Articles.Content:
All of my vessels have started uncontrollably spinning whenever i disable SAS. not really sure what the cause is, as i have quite a few mods installed, so i was wondering if anyone else has encountered this issue so we can compare mod lists and maybe come to a solution!

 

edit: never mind, turns out i had accidentally set trim, alt + x reset it!

Edited November 21, 2016 by Pell
solved
